title: Day 40 - Teddy
itunes:title: Day 40 - Teddy
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
Sometimes the most innocent things in life fill us with fear. Dolls. Clowns. Teddy bears. And sometimes, there's a reason for that fear.

***
